definition: to talk at length/to waste one's breath/variant of 廢話|废话[fei4 hua4]
to cost/to spend/fee/wasteful/expenses
surname Fei
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]
old variant of 話|话[hua4]

sentences.english: That all costs, are an excuse.
And for everyone who had bothered to spend a little time in this little space of mine.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢大家愿意花一点时间来这里阅读我所写的费话。

definition: incorrect variant of 囉嗦|啰嗦[luo1 suo5]
nonsense/rubbish/superfluous words/You don't say!/No kidding! (gently sarcastic)

shit/nonsense

to argue needlessly/to waste time explaining

lit. to go on a long detour/fig. to speak vaguely around the topic without getting to the point/to beat about the bush
